mapper.select: SELECT a.ESTIMATE_DATE, a.ESTIMATE_NO, c.CUSTOMER_CODE, c.CUSTOMER_NAME, c.BUSINESS_LICENSE_NUMBER, b.ESTIMATE_AMOUNT, b.UNIT_PRICE_OF_ESTIMATE, b.SUM_PRICE_OF_ESTIMATE, b.ITEM_NAME, b.DUE_DATE_OF_ESTIMATE, c.CUSTOMER_TEL_NUMBER FROM ESTIMATE a, ESTIMATE_DETAIL b, CUSTOMER c WHERE a.ESTIMATE_NO=b.ESTIMATE_NO AND a.CUSTOMER_CODE = c.CUSTOMER_CODE AND a.ESTIMATE_NO=#{estimateNo}
SELECT ESTIMATE_DETAIL_NO FROM ESTIMATE_DETAIL WHERE ESTIMATE_NO = #{estimateNo}
mapper.insert: Insert into ESTIMATE_DETAIL (ESTIMATE_DETAIL_NO, ESTIMATE_NO, ITEM_CODE, ITEM_NAME, UNIT_OF_ESTIMATE, DUE_DATE_OF_ESTIMATE, ESTIMATE_AMOUNT, UNIT_PRICE_OF_ESTIMATE, SUM_PRICE_OF_ESTIMATE, DESCRIPTION) values ( #{estimateDetailNo:VARCHAR} , #{estimateNo:VARCHAR} , #{itemCode:VARCHAR} , #{itemName:NVARCHAR} , #{unitOfEstimate:VARCHAR} , #{dueDateOfEstimate:VARCHAR} , #{estimateAmount:INTEGER} , #{unitPriceOfEstimate:INTEGER} , #{sumPriceOfEstimate:INTEGER} , #{description:NVARCHAR} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ESTIMATE_DETAIL SET ITEM_CODE = #{itemCode:VARCHAR} , ITEM_NAME = #{itemName:NVARCHAR} , UNIT_OF_ESTIMATE = #{unitOfEstimate:VARCHAR} , DUE_DATE_OF_ESTIMATE = #{dueDateOfEstimate:VARCHAR} , ESTIMATE_AMOUNT = #{estimateAmount:INTEGER} , UNIT_PRICE_OF_ESTIMATE = #{unitPriceOfEstimate:INTEGER} , SUM_PRICE_OF_ESTIMATE = #{sumPriceOfEstimate:INTEGER} , DESCRIPTION = #{description:NVARCHAR} WHERE ESTIMATE_DETAIL_NO = #{estimateDetailNo}
UPDATE ESTIMATE_DETAIL SET DUE_DATE_OF_ESTIMATE = #{dueDateOfEstimate} WHERE ESTIMATE_DETAIL_NO = #{estimateDetailNo};
